mlflex
Class SimpleWeightedMeanProbabilityEnsemblePredictor

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.AbstractEnsemblePredictor
      mlflex.MeanProbabilityEnsemblePredictor
          mlflex.SimpleWeightedMeanProbabilityEnsemblePredictor

public class SimpleWeightedMeanProbabilityEnsemblePredictor
extends MeanProbabilityEnsemblePredictor

This class represents an ensemble/combiner approach that computes the combined prediction according to the class probabilities that were assigned for each individual prediction. This particular approach uses the mean across the probabilities, weighted by the AUC attained in the inner cross-validation folds, to compute the combined prediction.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo
